Name: Fred
description:
Fred is an old man of forty five years, living with his wife and seven children, six of whom are attending school. He is a business man, with a milling machine in his village, an activity he has done for three years.

Alongside using his milling machine for cereals, Fred runs a produce business which supplements his daily income. In addition to this, Fred is involved in agriculture and through this, he has been able to supplement his income and provide food at home, so he is able to take care of his family. 

Fred says he has acquired this loan facility to boost his milling machine business and produce business as he wants to buy another machine to help him expedite his work.

Fred also says that his biggest clientele base is local people who bring maize for milling. According to him, his biggest challenge is limited capital and weather changes such as droughts and floods. He is described as a hard working man who has been able to achieve everything by his own efforts.
